panels.description:
Container is scheduled to some node

Scheduled == (üëç)

Scheduling pending  == (NotYet)  - Check current state from cluster
panels.title: Scheduled

panels.description: Container is in Pending/Stuck state  - Check current state from cluster
panels.title: Pending

panels.description:
Container has transitioned into Running state

Running == (üëç)

Stuck/Pending  == (üëé) - Check current state from cluster
panels.title: Running

panels.description:
Container is ready to serve requests

Able to serve requests == (üëç)

Not serving any requests  == (üëé)  - Check current state from cluster
panels.title: Ready

panels.description:
Wether container has been terminated or not.

Terminated == (Yes) - Check current state from cluster

Active == (Nope)
panels.title: Terminated

panels.description: Total number of processes running inside the container.
panels.title: Process Count

panels.description: Total number of restarts since the time of creation.
panels.title: Total Restarts

panels.description: Total number of restarts in last 15m.
panels.title: Restarts [15m]

panels.description: Total number of restarts in last 30m.
panels.title: Restarts [30m]

panels.description: CPU usage with limits and requests. If limit/request is not visible in graph then it means that particular metric has not been defined for the container.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage with limits and requests. If limit/request is not visible in graph then it means that particular metric has not been defined for the container.
panels.title: Memory Usage
